titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to J. H. Graham
CWG13687

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Folder Military Request and Authorization (Form 12) 1861-1861 (1)

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To J. H. Graham Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered as Telegraph opr April 1865

body.p: I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Genl of Ky

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 12 of May, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, Thirty Dollars -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

1133
No. 22
No 181 Abstract B "2" Qr. 1865.
J. H. Graham
Dollars 30 xx/100
Paid 12 May, 1865.
Contingencies
Telegraphing
339
